translation.en: Historically, when we look at evolution...
...it's not surprising that Chappie's left turn happened.
translation.ko: 채피의 등장은 예견된 일이었죠 '뉴욕 센티넬 네이선 스미스'

translation.en: It's too early to tell how this is all going to play out.
I didn't believe this would happen in my lifetime, but it is.
translation.ko: 예상보단 훨씬 빨리 등장했어요 'M.I.T. 윌리엄 로버츠'

translation.en: Each day, more than 300 murders and violent attacks take place here.
translation.ko: 매일 300여 건의 살인, 폭력 사건이 발생하죠

translation.en: Two officers have been killed, three taken to the hospital.
A bloody end to a shoot-out between cops and robbers.
Today, we usher in a new day.
-One that represents the end of crime. -Move in. Lock on target. Fire! Fire!
Go! Go! Up against the wall!

translation.ko: - 모든 표적 진압 완료 - 이 도시는∙∙∙

translation.en: Welcome to the world's first robotic police force.
translation.ko: 세계 최초의 로봇 경찰 군단을 소개합니다!

translation.en: Johannesburg, South Africa, became the focus of the world in 2016...
translation.ko: 요하네스버그가 세계 최초의 로봇 경찰 군단을 창설

translation.en: ...with the deployment of the planet's first all-robotic police units.
Crime levels plummeted, and Tetravaal stock skyrocketed.
Certain parts are from China, but all robots are assembled right here in South Africa.
translation.ko: 'CEO 미셸 브래들리' 부품 일부는 중국산이고 조립은 이곳 남아공에서 하죠

translation.en: The population's biggest fear was vulnerability to hacking.
Tetravaal assures this is not something to worry about...
A system which allows only them to update software on the robots.
Before the success of the ubiquitous human-sized police robots...
translation.ko: 사람 체구만 한 로봇 경찰이 등장하기 전까진

translation.en: ...there was a bigger bad boy on the block: the Moose.
translation.ko: 더 큰 로봇 무스가 개발 중이었죠

translation.en: Vincent Moore is a weapons designer and a former soldier.
translation.ko: 전직 군인인 무기 개발자 빈센트 무어는

translation.en: He has a spiritual issue with artificial intelligence.
I have a robot that is indestructible.
It is operated by a thinking, adaptable...
translation.ko: '무스 개발자 빈센트 무어' 게다가 정상적인 도덕성을 갖춘

translation.en: ...the human operator's thoughts into the robot's actions.
A departure from the AI that governs the Scouts.
Now with interest from the U.S., China and North Korea...
translation.ko: 미, 중, 북한이 관심을 보이는 가운데

translation.en: ...the Scouts' creator, Deon Wilson, sees a rich future.
translation.ko: 설계자 디온 윌슨은 밝은 미래를 장담합니다

translation.en: What really interests me is high-level AI.
translation.ko: 제 관심은 고도의 인공 지능입니다 '스카우트 설계자 디온 윌슨'

translation.en: True intelligence. A machine that can think and feel.
translation.ko: 생각하고 느낄 수 있는 진짜 인공 지능 말이죠

translation.en: Is that the mandate at Tetravaal?
To take that evolutionary step forward and build something truly alive?
translation.ko: 새로운 진화의 첫걸음이 될 진짜 살아있는 인공 지능?

translation.en: Scout 22 arriving now at Maintenance Bay 6.
-Team 1, off deck. Go! -Hurry. Open it up.
See this 22? Luck of the draw.
They used him as a speed bump.
Look at this. It's like he's cursed or something.
Every time he goes out. Now, yeah, it's his ear.
Antenna, right. Can we switch this out?
Reports of gunfire in Sections 5, 7 and 8.
Police request all available Scouts to be mobilized.
translation.ko: 동원 가능한 모든 스카우트 즉시 출동 바람

translation.en: Hey, 22, just watch yourself this time, eh?
-We're in shit! -Duh, we in shit, Amerika!
I said it was a bad deal.
-I said it over and over. -Everybody, just chill!
Yes, we have a problem. And, yes, I'm gonna solve it!
Command, we are searching for suspects driving a gray vehicle.
translation.ko: 본부, 회색 용의 차량을 추적 중이다

translation.en: We're lucky to be alive, Hippo.
You know there's no way out of this.
There's always a way. Name your price. We'll sort you out.
translation.ko: 해결할 수 있어 얼마야? 말만 해

translation.en: Fuck I'm gonna pay that back, dude?
-Now, get on your fucking knees! -Okay, okay, okay.
-Get behind the wall! -Yo-Landi, get in the van.
translation.ko: - 벽 뒤로 피해! - 욜란디, 밴에 타!

translation.en: Can't get a clear shot. Touching down.
-Who took the keys? -You gave it to that guy!
translation.ko: - 차 키 누가 가졌어? - 히포 줬잖아!

translation.en: Human officers are on the ground.
Drop your weapons. You are under arrest.
Come on. Where are the keys?
Hey, poes! I need my keys, please!
translation.ko: 야, 똘마니! 내 키 좀 줄래?

translation.en: -Drop your weapon. Drop your weapon! -Fuck you!
Shit! They hit the rotor. We need to touch down.
-Amerika! Amerika! I've got the keys! -Your keys.
-Hey, Landi, he's got the keys! -Let's go!
-Are you okay? -I'm not okay! I'm hit!
Yet another victory for the robotic police force.
translation.ko: 로봇 경찰의 또 한 번의 승리네요

translation.en: This marks the 30th large-scale crime ring smashed this year.
translation.ko: 대규모 범죄단이 체포된 게 올 들어 30번째입니다

translation.en: ...if I may have your attention, please.
The police chief just called me...
...to place an order for another 100 Scouts.
This is very, very good news.
-I couldn't have done it without you. -I know.
Is this the "I feel sorry for Vincent" call?
...we have one more stab with the police.
Try to get those costs down.
...when you keep cutting my funding. Twenty percent this year, 25 last year.
I've got work to do on the Moose.
The threat detection is still in its elemental phase.
Threat detection is superfluous. The operator detects the threat.
translation.ko: 탐지 시스템 필요 없어 그건 사람이 하면 돼

translation.en: Then we send the Moose out.
-Deon Wilson to the workshop. -I need to go. I'll talk to you in a bit.
translation.ko: - 디온 윌슨, 작업장으로! - 다시 전화하죠, 고마워요

translation.en: It's my little boy in again, eh?
Fucking surprise, surprise. Every time. He's a bullet magnet.
translation.ko: 출동 나갈 때마다 벌집 돼서 오네

translation.en: -What's going on, guys? -Here's the report. It's 22. Again.
See a lot of the internals got damaged.
-Brain architecture's still intact. -Regardless, it's a write-off.
-Okay, let's salvage the CPU. -We could try to cut the battery out.
-It's still charged, still stable. -No, not worth the effort.
translation.ko: - 가득 충전돼 있는데∙∙∙ - 괜히 일만 많아요

translation.en: Droid 22 written off. Crush the chassis and recycle the alloys. Yeah?
Come, come, come. Into the lair.
-Careful, man. -We need to stitch his shit up.
No, I didn't think that, Hippo.
You think you don't owe me this money anymore?
Because you think I'm in prison or what?
Maybe I come to your secret place in Soweto.
I come there with the fellows.
We got a week to come up with his money.
How are we gonna do that? Come on, that's ridiculous.
translation.ko: 그 돈을 어떻게 만들어? 말도 안 돼

translation.en: We pay that animal. We pocket the rest.
And we get out while we still can. Boom.
translation.ko: 기회 있을 때 튀는 거야, 붐!

translation.en: What are you getting on about, a bank job?
The droids are gonna come down on our asses, okay?
Guys, we need, like, a remote.
Okay, the robots are like machines, right?
So if we had a remote to switch it off....
We need to find the guy who makes the robots and steal his remotes.
translation.ko: 로봇을 만든 놈을 찾아서 그의 리모컨을 훔치는 거야

translation.en: -Have you been a good boy today? -Yes, Deon.
-Yeah? Did you clean my room? -Your room has been sterilized.
translation.ko: - 방 청소는 했고? - 소독까지 싹 했어요

translation.en: Are you working on your artificial intelligence program tonight?
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에도 인공 지능 프로그램 개발 작업 할 거예요?

translation.en: There's always chance of error, I'm aware of this.
But statistically speaking, I think I might be on track.
I have several terabytes of compiling and coding to do...
All right? See you in a bit.
Dude, it's gonna be so easy.
We need those remotes, my man.
Of course, to really know, I must test it on a live system.
-Hey. Where's the Scout? -How's it, sir? What?
-The Scout, man, 22 for demolition. -Guys are prepping the compactor.
Just wait for me, but don't destroy it, okay?
-What are you proposing now? -Ma'am, I think I've cracked it.
translation.ko: - 또 뭘 제안하시려고? - 성공한 거 같습니다

translation.en: The world's first proper, full artificial intelligence.
translation.ko: 세계 최초의 완벽한 인공 지능 개발에∙∙∙

translation.en: This is a computer system that might be smarter than a human.
I could show it a piece of art...
...and this thing, this being, could judge that art.
It could decide if it liked it.
It could write music and poetry.
Do you realize you just came...
...to the CEO of a publicly traded weapons corporation...
...and pitched a robot that can write poems?
Well, if you just let me explain--
Deon, Tetravaal is very happy with you.
The Scouts are a huge success.
Ma'am, look, it won't cost you anything.
A droid downstairs was written off yesterday, smashed beyond repair.
Let me install this on it.
-Please just let me test it. -No. No, I'm sorry, Deon.
translation.ko: - 테스트를 해보고∙∙∙ - 안 돼, 미안해, 디온

translation.en: You know how insurance works for those...
...all the red tape and the paperwork.
All new employees, please report to Human Resources for orientation.
Remember to have your security pass visible at all times.
Hey. Can you give me a hand over here?
This is you getting hijacked, my friend.
And these are all part of what makes the Moose unique...
translation.ko: 바로 그런 점이 경찰에 꼭 필요한

translation.en: ...and perfect for you at the department.
The strategic ability to neutralize the enemy's targets.
translation.ko: 레이더 설비, 비행기 연료 저장고 등

translation.en: We're taking out an enemy's aircraft?
We are talking about urban crimes here?
I'm talking all kinds of targets, sir. Low to high.
I do believe you need a weapons platform...
...that can fire warheads with precision and reliability.
And might I add, sir, all under the control of a human operator.
...the police force is very happy with the Scouts. Very, very happy.
We've been very successful at bringing down crime.
But this? No, we don't want this.
I mean, look at it. It's overkill. It's expensive, it's big, and it's ugly.
It'll have to get a hell of a lot worse for us to even consider this.
A hell of a lot worse.
No, I think we're done here.
Please. Please, I don't have much money.
Shut up. I don't want your money.
-We know who you are, my friend. -We know you make the robots.
translation.ko: - 우린 널 알아 - 너, 로봇 만들지?

translation.en: No, there must be a mistake.
We know you have some kind of TV remote thing to switch those robots off.
translation.ko: 너 무슨 리모컨 갖고 있지? 로봇을 끌 수 있는∙∙∙

translation.en: -Maybe there's one in the van. -Ja, check the van.
translation.ko: - 밴에 리모컨 있을 거야 - 가서 뒤져봐

translation.en: -Cut his feet off. -That's a good idea, Amerika.
translation.ko: - 다릴 잘라 - 안 돼, 안 돼

translation.en: -No, no, no! No, please! Help! -Yo, man, that's a good idea.
You can get yourself a nice, funky wheelchair.
translation.ko: 다릴 잘라줄 테니까 앞으론 휠체어나 타고 다녀

translation.en: No, please listen. You cannot switch them off.
They have a firmware lock. They're always on.
translation.ko: 펌웨어로 잠겨 있어서 늘 켜져 있어요

translation.en: He managed to turn this one off.
There's legs and shit all over the place. Was he gonna build it or something?
What if we get him to program this bad boy to fight for us?
Like an indestructible robot gangsta, number one, son.
Listen, my friend, we know about your little buddy...
Either you reprogram that robot in the van to work for us...
translation.ko: 저걸 우리가 쓸 수 있게 다시 프로그래밍해

translation.en: ...or we fucking shoot you right now.
-Don't play dumb! -You know exactly what we mean.
Turn that robot into the illest gangsta on the block.
We use him to make some moves and make some real money.
The one in my van is a test.
It's never been tried, but if it works, you can...
...train him to do what you want.
What do you mean, "if it works"?
It's a new project I'm working on.
It makes the robot have a mind like a human.
But it's like a child in the beginning.
Like a human baby, but smarter.
Its AI can learn much faster than any organic intelligence.
-But it has to be taught. -Well, for how long?
This is your only option! I'm telling you:
You cannot switch them off and you cannot hack the others.
translation.ko: 로봇을 끌 수도 해킹할 수도 없어요

translation.en: It's just plug and play. Quick release. Snap on and snap off.
-Why is all its legs off? -It was scheduled for destruction.
The battery's fused with the chassis.
-It means you can't change the battery. -How long will it last?
translation.ko: - 새 걸로 못 간다고요 - 얼마나 쓸 수 있는데?

translation.en: About five days, until the battery dies.
-This thing will only run for five days? -Roughly, yes.
A Guard Key. You need it to install new software.
translation.ko: 보안 키요 새 소프트웨어 설치 때 쓰는∙∙∙

translation.en: Remember I said it has to learn?
I have to come back and help to teach it.
Switch the thing on now, my friend.
Give it space. Give it space.
Please, please, please. Put the gun down.
Hey, come here. Come here, little buddy.
Please! It doesn't understand English yet. It doesn't understand you.
You gave me a retarded robot?
Ninjie-kun, just go in the kitchen. I've got this.
translation.ko: 닌자 군, 가 있어 나한테 맡기고∙∙∙

translation.en: I'll get it. Just go get a beer or something.
Can he understand me when I speak?
Come. No one's gonna hurt you.
I know you don't understand, but it's okay.
I'm just gonna get one more thing.
What's this? Hey, look at this.
No. No, no, no. No, his name is not--
translation.ko: 안 돼요, 안 돼 이름을 그런 식으로∙∙∙

translation.en: Wait! Wait! I need to get the Guard Key out of his head.
translation.ko: 잠깐만, 머리의 보안 키 좀 빼고요

translation.en: -I'll orient you if I ever see you again. -He's mine! He's special.
translation.ko: - 또 나타나면 죽어! - 쟨 내 거요, 특별한 애라고!

translation.en: I don't want any confrontation, okay? I'll see him tomorrow.
translation.ko: 싸울 생각 없어요 내일 와도 된다며요?

translation.en: You made an agreement. Let him train the robot.
Let me come and see him like we agreed. Please.
What the hell are you up to, Deon?
What the hell is this? Open.
And the Masters of the Universe!
...prince of Eternia and defender of the secrets of Castle Grayskull.
Fabulous secret powers were revealed to me...
translation.ko: 난 어느 날 신비한 힘을 얻게 됐어

translation.en: ...the day I held aloft my magic sword and said:
You stay under this roof, you make money for me.
translation.ko: 여기 사는 한 넌 돈을 벌어야 돼

translation.en: The first thing you do is you get your gun.
Then you cock your gun. Now it's ready to shoot, nè?
translation.ko: 이걸 당긴 뒤 쏘면 되는 거야

translation.en: I wanna shoot that blue bottle, there in the front.
Have a look. Nice and easy.
So I aim at the blue bottle, like, there it is. I'm like, "Okay, and--"
translation.ko: 파란 병을 겨누고 쏘면 돼 봐, 이렇게∙∙∙

translation.en: Now I'm gonna shoot the green bottle. Okay, look, I aim and pow! See?
translation.ko: 이제 녹색을 쏠게 겨누고∙∙∙ 빵! 봤지?

translation.en: Now I'm gonna shoot the yellow one.
Come here. Come here. Stand here. Now, listen, take the gun.
translation.ko: 와서 여기 서봐 자, 이제∙∙∙ 총을 들어

translation.en: Hold the gun proper-- Just straighten your arm.
Just hold the fucking gun properly, Chappie.
You fucked up my sight. This shit's expensive.
-What are you doing? -Teaching him to shoot.
You shouldn't be doing this shit with him yet.
translation.ko: 아직 그런 거 가르치면 안 돼

translation.en: Deon said he has to be orientated first.
Okay, you know what? I'm gonna go and get the weed on my own.
translation.ko: 됐고, 난 가서 마약이나 팔 거야

translation.en: And I'm gonna make all the money...
...so we can buy the explosives to do this heist.
He's not stupid. He's just a kid.
Go do your nails and play with your titanium baby!
translation.ko: 넌 그 티타늄 꼬마랑 숨바꼭질이나 해!

translation.en: Still a baby yourself, aren't you? Whoa, hey. What happened, man?
Jeez. You got a little bit rowdy at the bar with your mates?
If you ever wanna come out with me, go hit the heavy bag at the gym...
translation.ko: 나하고 체육관 가서 샌드백 좀 칠래?

translation.en: ...we could nut out a few great moves.
Always gotta be ready. You know what I'm saying?
-Want in? -Thanks for the offer, but I'm good.
It's real cool, man. It's really cool.
Hey, listen, bit of a favor.
Just wanted to borrow the Guard Key...
...so I can check Scout security levels with my design.
I just wanna make sure that the Moose is as secure as the Scouts.
Michelle asked me to check on the security, so....
Yeah, just an hour or something.
Vincent, you know I can't do that, right?
Mate, don't be such a wowser.
One engineer to another, asking for the Guard Key.
You'd have to tell the Board of--
I spent two years at DARPA, you whacker.
And, yeah, I was SASR, you little stickybeak.
You're making me as cross as a frog in a sock, mate.
translation.ko: 넌 날 너무 열 받게 해

translation.en: Your robots have drained all my funding.
translation.ko: 네 로봇이 내 연구비 다 썼어

translation.en: You're a big problem for me, you get me?
So I'm gonna start asking you slowly, you dipstick.
translation.ko: 천천히 말할 테니 잘 들어, 자식아
뒈지기 싫으면 당장 보안 키를 내놔

translation.en: As if I'd carry live rounds here.
It's a prank. Everyone go back to work, man. Come on.
Any Sunday, mate, you're welcome. Come with me.
To all of you. All welcome.
This office has gotta lighten up.
Where are you going, mate? Where are you going?
Wait, wait. Chappie, look. Look. Look.
No, he's stupid. He can't talk. We're screwed.
No, he can talk. He's smart.
No, he can talk. He's smart.
-Oh, my God. Look, he's copying me! -Oh, my God. Look, he's copying me!
translation.ko: - 어머, 날 따라 하네 - 어머, 날 따라 하네

translation.en: That homes is a clever little robot.
That homes is a clever little robot right there.
-This motherfucker talks ghetto. -This fuck mother talks ghetto.
translation.ko: - 이 씹새, 껌 좀 씹었는데? - 이 십새, 껌 좀 씹었는데?

translation.en: All right, you the rudest bad boy in Joburg.
Chappie be the rudest bad boy...
-Yes! Yes! It's gonna work, man. -Yes! Yes! Fuck mother!
translation.ko: - 그래, 쓸 만하네 - 그래, 이 십새야!

translation.en: -He's so smart! -I can work with this.
All right, let's pound it out.
-You shouldn't be here. Go. -I'm here to see my--
translation.ko: - 여기 오면 안 돼, 가 - 내 로봇 좀∙∙∙

translation.en: No. He's coming back soon. You're lucky to be alive.
translation.ko: 곧 닌자가 올 거야 걸리면 넌 죽어

translation.en: -I'm just gonna say hello, if-- -What is that stuff?
translation.ko: - 그냥 잠깐 인사만∙∙∙ - 그건 다 뭐야?

translation.en: I'm here to teach him. Like we agreed. Yeah?
You're gonna catch a bullet hanging around here, nerd.
Have we learnt this word yet?
Watch your mouth. Before you get yourself shanked.
Better watch your mouth. You're gonna get yourself shanked.
Chappie, please, have respect for me. I'm your maker.
translation.ko: 채피, 고운 말 써 난 널 만든 설계자야

translation.en: Please. If I could just have a moment with him.
You know, surely you can go and count your narcotics in another room.
translation.ko: 환각제 개수 세는 건 옆방 가서 해요

translation.en: You come in here, tell me where to go, where to do my work?
-I don't mean to impose. -Shut your mouth.
Don't count drugs in front of the kid.
translation.ko: 애 앞에서 그런 거 세지 마

translation.en: I gotta get this shit done.
By the time I finish, you'd better be gone.
translation.ko: 약 알 다 세기 전에 꺼져

translation.en: Listen to me, I'm your maker.
I brought you into this world, okay?
This is serious. Mustn't engage in these people's lifestyle choices.
translation.ko: 잘 들어, 이 사람들 하는 짓을 배워선 안 돼

translation.en: No counting narcotics, no robberies, no crimes.
translation.ko: 마약 거래, 강도질 같은 범죄는 나쁜 거야

translation.en: -Chappie, no crimes. -Okay. And you've gotta promise me.
It's that you promise me that you'll never do any of those things, all right?
translation.ko: 안 하기로 한 건 안 하는 게 약속이야

translation.en: You can't break a promise, Chappie.
Come on. You said you'd teach him stuff.
Yeah, sure. Okay. Come. Chappie, sit here. Come on.

...and last night he brought a droid in here...
And have you seen this? Do you know?
It's committing crimes, the monster. Look at that.
The Scout model is nearly indestructible.
Okay. That's a lot worse than just failing to work.
translation.ko: 지금 로봇이 먹통 된 게 문제가 아니오

translation.en: So let's use this situation to make a certain other robot shine.
translation.ko: 이 기회에 다른 모델의 능력을 보여줍시다

translation.en: This thing has gotta be destroyed...
...crushed before it does any more damage, and Deon--
He has cost this company dearly. And your reputation.
translation.ko: 놈은 당신과 회사에 큰 타격을 줬소

translation.en: You do not want this to be your legacy.
I authorize the launch of the Moose.
Repeat: I authorize the launch of the Moose.
Move it out! Clear the deck!
Move it out! Let's move! Move! Now!
Moose launch in T-minus five minutes.
Come on, get out of here.
Everyone out! Go! Move! Move! Move!
I'm going home! I'm going home!
Daddy, can we go and get my new body...
...from your friend with the fresh one?
I'm sorry, man, but there is no new bodies.
translation.ko: 미안한데, 채피 새 몸 같은 건 없어

translation.en: What do you mean, no new bodies? Daddy, we've got the monies.
translation.ko: 뭐? 새 몸이 없다니? 우리 돈 많잖아

translation.en: I needed your help with the heist.
Just relax, Chappie. At the time you were different and, like....
translation.ko: 진정해 그때만 해도 널 잘 몰랐어

translation.en: -Why you lie to me?! Why?! -No! Stop, Chappie!
I'm coming to get you, Deon.
Come on. Come on. Come on, come on, come on!
Leave me, Amerika! You lied to me!
You were gonna let me die, Daddy!
You were gonna let me die!
We can find a way, Chappie. I'm sorry, my boy.
translation.ko: 방법이 있을 거야, 채피 정말 미안해

translation.en: Chappie, listen, I know how you feel...
...but there's something headed our way now, coming to hurt you.
translation.ko: 더 위험한 존재가 오고 있어 널 해치려고∙∙∙

translation.en: When this thing gets here, it'll stop at nothing until you're gone, Chappie.
translation.ko: 놈은 네가 죽을 때까지 공격을 안 멈출 거야

translation.en: I'm going anyways. My battery's gonna finish.
translation.ko: 난 어차피 죽어 배터리가 다 돼가

translation.en: Get back! Back up, back up!
I don't just want my 20 million.
That just tickles, boys. That just tickles.
Yep. Fly up, fly up, fly up.
I'm gonna finish you off. Every single pathetic scum lot of you.
translation.ko: 다 끝장내주마 너희 한심한 쓰레기들 모두!

translation.en: Jesus, dude! Get out of way!
What's going on? I can't see.
You'll be okay. I've solved it! We'll get your consciousness out.
translation.ko: 내가 방법을 찾았어 당신 마음을 꺼내자

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Getting the neural helmet!
translation.ko: - 채피, 뭐 하게? - 신경 헬멧 가져올게!

translation.en: I'm coming for you now, mate.
I have to get my maker to that other helmet at the factory!
translation.ko: 아빠, 공장의 다른 헬멧을 가져와야 돼!

translation.en: I'm gonna draw this thing away from us. Okay. Take her!

translation.ko: - 안 돼! 안 돼, 닌자! - 가, 채피!

translation.en: Oh, my gosh, look at you.
What you doing? What you doing?!
Come on! Come! Come on, do it!
This is your day of reckoning.
Maker! Maker, who did this to Mommy?
I hate him! Why?! Why do they do the hurtings?!
translation.ko: 그놈 나빠! 왜 사람을 해치는 거야?

translation.en: Daddy, stay there! Chappie's gonna crush the man!
translation.ko: 아빠, 여기 있어 박살 내고 올게

translation.en: Wait here. I'm gonna get the bad man from the van!

translation.ko: 안 돼 총을 쓰는 건 나빠

translation.en: I'm gonna crush you, bad man!
I'm gonna crush you for hurting my mommy!
I'm gonna teach you a lesson.
You are a very bad man.
Now I forgive you, bad man.
Don't go to the next place.
-There's only one droid. -Let me get your new body.
For chrissake, Chappie, just save yourself.
It's gonna be okay. Stay with me, Deon.
Maker, please take it slow. This will be very disorientating for a human.
translation.ko: 설계자, 천천히 움직여 인간에겐 꽤 이상한 경험일 거야

translation.en: Do you have an angle grinder or something?
I don't know what this means.
Chappie. We have to help you now.
It's okay, maker. You got saved.
There are hundreds of bodies all over the city. Here it is!
translation.ko: 온 도시에 수백 개의 로봇이 있어 이게 보안 키야

translation.en: Vincent set up a way to remotely deactivate droids.
We can use it to move you to a new body.
I'm scared. What if it doesn't work?
-I promise. -And you can never break a promise.
Chappie goes in the new body.
Let's go, boys! Tetravaal, stay back! Now, boys, go!
We both have new bodies now.
translation.ko: 이제 둘 다 새 몸을 가졌네

translation.en: I'm sorry you had to leave your other body.
But it was the only way to save you.

translation.ko: - 준비됐지, 엄마? 뭔가 생각해봐 - 생각하고 있어 '엄마 마음 백업 테스트'

translation.en: It's just a temporary body, Mommy.
translation.ko: 이 몸은 영원한 게 아니야, 엄마

translation.en: I'll make you a new one.
You don't have to go to the next place.
South African authorities placed an immediate halt...
...on the use of any robotic element of law enforcement...
In Johannesburg, there have been several sightings...
The police ask viewers who have seen Chappie...
We'll have more on this as it develops.
Now we are both black sheeps, Mommy.
translation.ko: 이젠 우리 둘 다 까만 양이야, 엄마
